title: The Adventure Zone: Dust - Episode 4
description: Sunlight creeps over the horizon. The Graysons are one big break away from cracking their case wide open -- but will they find their quarry before Dry River wakes up? Augustus does some spectral recon. Gandy cracks open a dangerous tome. Errol angers a friend.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
